name: Afore In The Dark
description:
You stumble upon a house whilst hiking in the woods; you're tired and hungry and could really use just a quick pit-stop. The owner's wouldn't mind you just getting out of the chilly night for a few minutes, would they? It looks vacant, but for the food in the cupboard. The house is deathly quiet, save for that small bump overhead. 

It's vacant, but not abandoned, and clearly something lurks within.

Four different endings available, minimal backtracking required. There are two key points from which you can access different endings. No complete restart required to access different sections of the story.
